input_args.passage: 'Rhys ap Tewdwr | Rhys ap Tewdwr (c. 1040 – 1093) was a king of Deheubarth in Wales and member of the Dinefwr dynasty, a branch descended from Rhodri the Great.'
input_args.claim: 'Although this citation does not directly mention the rank of Tewdwr ap Peredur, it suggests that a person named "ap Tewdwr" could potentially be a king, as "ap" usually means "son of" in Welsh names.'
